headline: SLB (SLB) Had A Great Quarter, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. SLB N.V. (NYSE:SLB) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. SLB N.V. (NYSE:SLB) is one of the largest oil and gas production equipment providers in the world. Its shares are up by 20% over the past year and by 20% year-to-date. BMO Capital hiked […]

headline: Jim Cramer Discuses Halliburton’s (HAL) Infrastructure Business
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Oil and gas exploration equipment provider Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL)’s shares, like those of its peer SLB, have also performed well recently. They are up by 28.8% over the past year and by 13% year-to-date. […]
